h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">什么是热更新</h2>
<p>热更新一般指app有小规模更新，以直接打补丁的形式更新app，对比之下，另一种更新就是重新下载整个app包，热更新方式常见于手游，因为现在的手游都比较大，一般都是几百兆到几个G之间，如果有小的更新就让用户重新下载完整包，估计没几天这个app就没人用了</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">web热更新&热加载实现的前提</h2>
<p>如果按照上面的说法，可能web就没有热更新了，主要因为web是B/S（浏览器+服务端），浏览器主要和服务器通过http协议通信，服务端响应http请求之后，本次http连接就结束了，不像app是c/s（客户端+服务端），服务端无法推送补丁到浏览器更新，但是为什么现在web可以实现 <strong>热加载 hot-loader 或者是模块热更替 HMR</strong>
主要归功于HTML5中提出的俩种新的通信方式</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>WebSocket： 一种允许浏览器与服务器间建立tcp长链接的通信机制</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>EventSource（Server-Sent-Events）: 服务器推送的一个网络事件接口。一个EventSource实例会对HTTP服务开启一个持久化的连接，以 <code>text/event-stream</code> 格式发送事件, 会一直保持开启直到被要求关闭。（具体的可以看这篇文章 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ruanyifeng.com%2Fblog%2F2017%2F05%2Fserver-sent_events.html" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2017/05/server-sent_events.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2017/0…</a> ）</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>区别：</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>与WebSocket不同的是，EventSource服务端推送是单向的。数据信息被单向从服务端到客户端分发. 当不需要以消息形式将数据从客户端发送到服务器时，这使EventSource成为绝佳的选择。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>SSE 支持断开重连，WebSocket需要自己实现</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>SSE 使用 HTTP 协议，现有的服务器软件都支持。WebSocket 是一个独立协议。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>SSE一般只用来传送文本，二进制数据需要编码后传送，WebSocket 默认支持传送二进制数据</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>SSE 支持自定义发送的消息类型。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">webpack热更新原理</h2>
<p>热加载：不保留页面状态，简单粗暴直接刷新浏览器，类似window.location.reload()
热更新： 另一种是基于 <code>WDS (Webpack-dev-server)</code> 的模块热替换，只需要局部刷新页面上发生变化的模块，同时可以保留当前的页面状态（webpack-dev-server自己做不到，需要配合react-hot-loader使用），比如复选框的选中状态、输入框的输入等</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">Webpack 构建</h3>
<p>运行npm run start，会在控制台打印出如下信息</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/42b1d37b89af43199a3ac2747c5e0c0f~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>其中的 <code>hash：8420886c15f084075f1d</code> 字段，代表一次编译的标识。当修改代码保存后，webpack会重新编译代码，控制台显示如下</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/5aa22c45b21b4fcdaed29f0a518e2b7b~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>发现hash已经变为 <code>94992a48d7e645922c7b</code> 因为这代表了一次新的编译
对比发现，会出现新的文件
新的js： <code>main.8420886c15f084075f1d.hot-update.js</code>
新的json： <code>8420886c15f084075f1d.hot-update.json</code>
观察仔细可以发现上一次的 <code>hash：8420886c15f084075f1d</code> 为本次生成js和json的前缀
再来看一下浏览器端，代码修改保存，webpack编译后，浏览器都会发出一下俩个请求</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/5a46b8defbec4e7187c0bef55abab304~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>可以看出请求的文件即为本次编译生成的js和json文件，然后来看一下每一个文件的内容
首先看一下json文件的内容</p>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/09b861e96195408db8a1ca90c1b42073~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p><code>c</code> 字段代表，当前变化的 <code>module</code> ， <code>h</code> 字段代表当前编译的 <code>hash</code> ，用于作为下次请求文件的前缀
再看一下js文件的内容， <code>xxx</code> 即为 <code>moduleId</code> , 以后再讨论 <code>webpackHotUpdate</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">webpackHotUpdate(<span class="hljs-string">"main"</span>,&#123; 
    <span class="hljs-string">'xxx'</span>: (<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"><span class="hljs-built_in">module</span>, __webpack_exports__, __webpack_require__</span>) </span>&#123;&#125;)) 
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>今天分享的内容是热更新的过程中服务端都做了什么</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">服务端都做了什么呢</h3>
<p>讨论前，先运行以下几步，通过（create-react-app）来创建的react项目来调试</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><code>npm run eject</code> 来生成配置</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>修改 <code>config</code> 目录下的 <code>webpack.config.js</code></p>
</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> shouldUseReactRefresh = env.raw.FAST_REFRESH || <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
<span class="hljs-comment">// 改为</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> shouldUseReactRefresh = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>

<p>首先看一下 <code>updateCompiler()</code> 函数，截取了其中主要的代码
webpack-dev-server/lib/utils/updateCompiler.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-meta">'use strict'</span>;

<span class="hljs-comment">/* eslint-disable
  no-shadow,
  no-undefined
*/</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> webpack = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'webpack'</span>);
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> addEntries = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'./addEntries'</span>);
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> getSocketClientPath = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'./getSocketClientPath'</span>);

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">updateCompiler</span>(<span class="hljs-params">compiler, options</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (options.inline !== <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 找 hmr 插件</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> findHMRPlugin = <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">config</span>) =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!config.plugins) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">undefined</span>;
      &#125;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> config.plugins.find(
        <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">plugin</span>) =></span> plugin.constructor === webpack.HotModuleReplacementPlugin
      );
    &#125;;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> compilers = [];
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> compilersWithoutHMR = [];
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> webpackConfig;
    webpackConfig = compiler.options;
    compilers.push(compiler);
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 没有找到</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!findHMRPlugin(compiler.options)) &#123;
      compilersWithoutHMR.push(compiler);
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 向入口文件中添加东西</span>
    addEntries(webpackConfig, options);
    
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果找到了插件，那么运行插件（即调用插件的apply方法）</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (options.hot || options.hotOnly) &#123;
      compilersWithoutHMR.forEach(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">compiler</span>) =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> plugin = findHMRPlugin(compiler.options);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (plugin) &#123;
          plugin.apply(compiler);
        &#125;
      &#125;);
    &#125;
  &#125;
&#125;

<p>看一下 <code>addEntries()</code> 方法
webpack-dev-server/lib/utils/addEntries.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-meta">'use strict'</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> webpack = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'webpack'</span>);
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> createDomain = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'./createDomain'</span>);

<span class="hljs-comment">/**
 * A Entry, it can be of type string or string[] or Object<string | string[],string>
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@typedef <span class="hljs-type">&#123;(string[] | string | Object<string | string[],string>)&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">Entry</span></span>
 */</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">/**
 * Add entries Method
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;?Object&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">config</span></span> - Webpack config
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;?Object&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">options</span></span> - Dev-Server options
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;?Object&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">server</span></span>
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@returns <span class="hljs-type">&#123;void&#125;</span></span>
 */</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">addEntries</span>(<span class="hljs-params">config, options, server</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (options.inline !== <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> app = server || &#123;
      <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">address</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">port</span>: options.port &#125;;
      &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-comment">// clientEntry</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> domain = createDomain(options, app);
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> sockHost = options.sockHost ? <span class="hljs-string">`&sockHost=<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;options.sockHost&#125;</span>`</span> : <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> sockPath = options.sockPath ? <span class="hljs-string">`&sockPath=<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;options.sockPath&#125;</span>`</span> : <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> sockPort = options.sockPort ? <span class="hljs-string">`&sockPort=<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;options.sockPort&#125;</span>`</span> : <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> clientEntry = <span class="hljs-string">`<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;<span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>.resolve(
      <span class="hljs-string">'../../client/'</span>
    )&#125;</span>?<span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;domain&#125;</span><span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;sockHost&#125;</span><span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;sockPath&#125;</span><span class="hljs-subst">$&#123;sockPort&#125;</span>`</span>;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// hotEntry</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (options.hotOnly) &#123;
      hotEntry = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>.resolve(<span class="hljs-string">'webpack/hot/only-dev-server'</span>);
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (options.hot) &#123;
      hotEntry = <span class="hljs-built_in">require</span>.resolve(<span class="hljs-string">'webpack/hot/dev-server'</span>);
    &#125;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> checkInject = <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">option, _config, defaultValue</span>) =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> option === <span class="hljs-string">'boolean'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> option;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">typeof</span> option === <span class="hljs-string">'function'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> option(_config);
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> defaultValue;
    &#125;;

      <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> additionalEntries = checkInject(
        options.injectClient,
        config,
        webTarget
      )
        ? [clientEntry]
        : [];

      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (hotEntry && checkInject(options.injectHot, config, <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>)) &#123;
        additionalEntries.push(hotEntry);
      &#125;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// </span>
      config.entry.unshift(additionalEntries)
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果没有hmr插件时，将hmr插件加入</span>
      config.plugins.push(<span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> webpack.HotModuleReplacementPlugin());
      
      
      
    &#125;);
  &#125;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-built_in">module</span>.exports = addEntries;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>通过上面可知整个 <code>updateCompiler()</code> 函数主要做了</p>
<ul>
<li>将以下俩个文件加入到入口中 <code>xxx/node_modules/webpack-dev-server/client/index.js</code> 文件主要负责和服务端进行通信 <code>xxx/node_modules/webpack/hot/dev-server.js</code> 主要负责热更新的逻辑</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">[
    <span class="hljs-string">'xxx/node_modules/webpack-dev-server/client/index.js?[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000/)'</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">'xxx/node_modules/webpack/hot/dev-server.js'</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">'../src/index.js'</span>
]
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<ul>
<li>加入 <code>HotModuleReplacementPlugin</code> 插件，并调用执行插件（调用apply方法）</li>
</ul>
<p>继续看一下 <code>setupHooks</code> 主要做了什么，截取了其中主要代码
Server.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">setupHooks () &#123;

      <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> &#123; done &#125; = compiler.hooks;

        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>._stats = stats;

  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.sockWrite(sockets, <span class="hljs-string">'hash'</span>, stats.hash);
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.sockWrite(sockets, <span class="hljs-string">'ok'</span>);

<p><code>setupHooks</code> 主要做了</p>

<li>监听webpack编译完成，通过 <code>websocket</code> 发送消息给前端</li>
</ul>
<p>接着向下看 <code>setupApp</code>
Server.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setupApp</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// Init express server</span>
        <span class="hljs-comment">// eslint-disable-next-line new-cap</span>
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.app = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> express();
     &#125;

<p>没什么好说的，接着看 <code>setupDevMiddleware</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setupDevMiddleware</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// middleware for serving webpack bundle</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.middleware = webpackDevMiddleware(
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.compiler,
      <span class="hljs-built_in">Object</span>.assign(&#123;&#125;, <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.options, &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">logLevel</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.log.options.level &#125;)

<p>看 <code>webpackDevMiddleware</code> , 文件位于 <code>webpack-dev-middleware</code> 包下的index.js
index.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-built_in">module</span>.exports = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">wdm</span>(<span class="hljs-params">compiler, opts</span>) </span>&#123;

  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> context = createContext(compiler, options);
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 监听代码变化，重新编译</span>
    context.watching = compiler.watch(options.watchOptions, <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">err</span>) =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (err) &#123;
        context.log.error(err.stack || err);
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (err.details) &#123;
          context.log.error(err.details);
        &#125;
      &#125;
    &#125;);

  setFs(context, compiler);
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 暂时先不管返回的东西</span>
&#125;;
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 省略了一些没用的代码</span>
  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setFs</span>(<span class="hljs-params">context, compiler</span>)</span> &#123;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> fileSystem;

    <span class="hljs-comment">// store our files in memory</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> isConfiguredFs = context.options.fs;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> isMemoryFs =
      !isConfiguredFs &&
      !compiler.compilers &&
      compiler.outputFileSystem <span class="hljs-keyword">instanceof</span> MemoryFileSystem;

    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (isConfiguredFs) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 省略</span>
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (isMemoryFs) &#123;
      fileSystem = compiler.outputFileSystem;
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
      fileSystem = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> MemoryFileSystem();
      compiler.outputFileSystem = fileSystem;
    &#125;
    context.fs = fileSystem;
  &#125;,
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>从上面代码可以看出到目前为止，主要做了</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>以 <code>watch mode</code> 的方式启动了 <code>webpack</code> ，一旦监测的文件变更，便会重新进行编译打包，</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>将 <code>webpack</code> 文件的存储方式改为了内存存储，提高了文件的存储读取效率。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>继续看webpack-dev-middleware 中 <code>index.js</code> 返回的内容
webpack-dev-middleware/index.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">wdm</span> (<span class="hljs-params">compiler, opts</span>) </span>&#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Object</span>.assign(middleware(context), &#123;
          <span class="hljs-comment">// 省略</span>
      &#125;);
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-comment">// middleware</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">module</span>.exports = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">wrapper</span>(<span class="hljs-params">context</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">middleware</span>(<span class="hljs-params">req, res, next</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> filename = getFilenameFromUrl(
      context.options.publicPath,
      context.compiler,
      req.url
    );
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Promise</span>(<span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">resolve</span>) =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果内存中文件名满足hash，且是一个文件而不是目录，就会执行processRequest</span>
      handleRequest(context, filename, processRequest, req);
      <span class="hljs-comment">// eslint-disable-next-line consistent-return</span>
      <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">processRequest</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span> &#123;
         <span class="hljs-comment">// 省略代码</span>
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 读取文件内容</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> content = context.fs.readFileSync(filename);
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 省略代码</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (res.send) &#123;
          res.send(content);
        &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
          res.end(content);
        &#125;

        resolve();
      &#125;
    &#125;);
  &#125;;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><code>middleware</code> 方法是一个中间件包装函数，然后返回这个中间件，中间件的作用是拦截浏览器请求的更新文件，从内存中读取内容返回，回到 <code>setupDevMiddleware</code> 方法
webpack-dev-server/lib/Server.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setupDevMiddleware</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// middleware for serving webpack bundle</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.middleware = webpackDevMiddleware(
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.compiler,
      <span class="hljs-built_in">Object</span>.assign(&#123;&#125;, <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.options, &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">logLevel</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.log.options.level &#125;)
    );
  &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>由此可知， <code>this.middleware</code> 即为返回的中间件
<code>setupDevMiddleware</code> 主要做了</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>以 <code>watch mode</code> 的方式启动了 <code>webpack</code> ，一旦监测的文件变更，便会重新进行编译打包，</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>将 <code>webpack</code> 文件的存储方式改为了内存存储，提高了文件的存储读取效率。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>初始化 <code>this.middleware</code> 中间件，中间件的作用是拦截浏览器请求更新文件，从内存中读取文件内容返回</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>接着向下看 <code>setupFeature()</code> 方法
webpack-dev-server/lib/Server.js</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript">  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setupFeatures</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> features = &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">middleware</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// include our middleware to ensure</span>
        <span class="hljs-comment">// it is able to handle '/index.html' request after redirect</span>
        <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.setupMiddleware();
      &#125;
    &#125;;
    features[<span class="hljs-string">'middleware'</span>]()
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-comment">// this.middleware 为上面的中间件，加载该中间件</span>
  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">setupMiddleware</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>)</span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.app.use(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.middleware);
  &#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><code>setUpFeature()</code> 主要做了</p>
<ul>
<li>加载中间件</li>
</ul>
<p>继续向下看 <code>createServer()</code> 函数</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript copyable" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.listeningApp = http.createServer(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.app);
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>主要做了</p>

<li>创建服务器</li>
</ul>
